summary: This is an email forwarding a US Virgin Islands search warrant for review. It was sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, indicating coordination between federal prosecutors regarding the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email forwarding the USVI search warrant for review, working in the Southern District of New York.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A US Virgin Islands search warrant was being circulated for review among federal prosecutors on August 10, 2019.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates ongoing investigative activity and coordination regarding the Epstein case shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
